title: Revert to Version 54

requirements.text: Restore the codebase to the exact state of Version 54, removing all features and changes introduced in versions 55-59
acceptanceCriteria: All files match the Version 54 snapshot
Features added after Version 54 are completely removed

requirements.text: Remove the StableDialogContent component and all its usages, reverting dialogs to standard DialogContent from Radix UI
acceptanceCriteria: All dialog implementations use standard Radix DialogContent
No references to StableDialogContent remain in the codebase

requirements.text: Remove mobile keyboard focus handling features from property and inquiry forms
acceptanceCriteria: Dialog forms behave as they did in Version 54
No special mobile keyboard focus tracking is present

requirements.text: Remove DRAFT_STATE.md documentation file that describes the Version 54 revert
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/DRAFT_STATE.md is deleted from the project

constraints: Must preserve all data and backend state
Must maintain authentication and user session continuity
Must not break existing deployments or canister state
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond Version 54 state
Maintaining any features introduced after Version 54
